name: KoruStar
body:
# KoruStar
KoruStar Ltd. is a software development consultancy, started in January 2011. KoruStar is based in New Zealand, and mainly works for clients in Europe and the U.S.

## Payment Industry
KoruStar's primary client is an international payment processor called [SIX Payment Services](https://www.six-payment-services.com/).

SIX provide integrated payment solutions for merchants worldwide.

## Am Laher
KoruStar is owned by Am (Amir) Laher, a British citizen based in New Zealand. Am has over 10 years of experience in software, including 8 years in the finance sector. Am is on [LinkedIn](http://www.linkedin.com/in/korustar)

### Open Source
Additionally, Am contributes to some small open source software projects. See [Am's github pages](http://laher.github.com/)
